abstract: Photographer Sara Bennett documents transition of four female convicted murderers from prison life to back to freedom in New York City; former public defender wants photo series and her self-published book Life After Life in Prison to spur re-examination of criminal justice system.
lead_paragraph: Sara Bennett quit the law to become a photographer and learned how little she knew about the lives of prisoners.
snippet: Sara Bennett quit the law to become a photographer and learned how little she knew about the lives of prisoners....
